12.content: Which of these pokemon are there
12.title: A town

123.content:
You are taking a stroll through chocovine town. When you encounter a 25foot tall luxray.
"Hello there, Who are you?"he asks.
"I am Phoenixgod von Dragaic VII." you said
"Will you be my friend," it asked?
"Sure."
123.title: luxio

choices: John the 25 foot tall luxray and Mike heard 15 Stomps.
1231.content:
You climded on top of the 25 feet tall luxray's back and said "Are you a male or female"
The 25 feet tall luxray said "male" and started to walk.
You noticed his giant footprints on the ground and said "Mister luxray sir..."
The 25 feet tall male luxray turned his head with a smile on his face and said "It's John short for Jonathan"
You said "Phoenix von Dragaic VII wasn't my real name It's Mike and did you just talk and how did you got big"
John said "Yes i can talk and do you want to know how i got big"
Mike said "Yes please"
then
1231.title: Reader's choice

123121.content:
the light enveloped him. He then started growing.
When he finished growing he was 26feet tall.
He lied down and said to mike to get off his back
You climded off of the 26 feet tall luxray's back
John closed his eyes and the light enveloped him
John lifted himself effortlessly off his forelegs they looked like they could now grip,
The light fades and John opened his eyes to look at his new self, he did have a totally human shape but like a Luxray standing on two legs with his heels on the ground so he can walk perfertly like a human.
He kneels down to pick you up, puts you on his shoulder and started to walk.
You noticed his giant footprints on the ground and noticed that their different.
He walk to...
123121.title: A little (1-15 ft.)

info.brief_description: Is an interctive story about a shinx, a luxio and a huge luxray
info.description:
Is an interctive story about a shinx, a luxio and a 25ft tall luxray that's friendly, loves to take care of his friends,gain weight, and grow gaint.
Other pokemon can join too.
They are all Male.
The 25ft tall luxray's friends are Buizel, Floatzel, Vulpix, Eevee and their 8 Eeveelutions, Electrike, Manectric, Shinx and Luxio.
Vulpix, Eevee and their 8 Eeveelutions, Electrike, Manectric, Shinx and Luxio including the 25ft tall luxray have the ability to stand up on their back legs and their heel's are on the ground so they can walk perfertly like a human.
